description:
Shorts that go the distance. The Taiss SO Shorts are designed for long alpine climbing tours and multi-day hikes through pathless terrain.

They are made from a robust and very abrasion-proof soft shell double fabric that is both wind-repellent and breathable. The water-repellent treatment is PFC-free. The material’s elasticated properties allow you to move freely. An essential requirement for climbing and hiking in alpine terrain.

The waistband of the shorts can be easily adjusted to ensure a perfect fit. The climbing harness-compatible pockets have zippers to make sure nothing gets lost. The Taiss are our most rugged shorts. Made for cliff walls and alpine terrain.
name: Mammut Taiss SO Shorts - Mens
